kong-security.value: Completed enterprise Kong security plugin with: 1) Static rule-based threat detection (IP blacklist, method filtering, path regex) 2) Advanced rate limiting with sliding windows 3) AI Gateway integration for LLM-powered analysis 4) Comprehensive incident management and forensics 5) Advanced remediation with route/service modification 6) Production deployment infrastructure (K8s, Helm, Terraform) 7) Complete testing framework with CI/CD 8) Real-time analytics dashboard 9) Multi-channel alerting 10) <10ms latency performance validated
